summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of streaming services, such as movies, music, TV shows, sports packages, and live events. They have several packages available, with the most popular being the Premium package which costs $19.99 per month and includes access to all streaming services. Customers can access these services on any device with an internet connection and there are apps available for iOS and Android devices. Additionally, customers can enjoy exclusive discounts and deals from partners, as well as discounts on packages when purchased in advance.
